page.title: 09A CARNOUSTIE FAMILY'S DAY.
page.content: A typical day in the life of a family in this area might be something like the following. The family consists of{mother, {father}and their two children,{Daniel aged 14 and{Clare}aged 9. Father works as an{Insurance agent}in the nearby city of Dundee, while mother is a{Modern Languages teacher}at the local High School. Daniel attends the High School, while Clare attends Primary School. Mother is first to rise in the morning, about 7am. and she prepares breakfast for the rest of the family. Everyone lends a hand with the washing-up, the children tidy their bedrooms and all are ready to leave home by 8.30am. Daniel and Clare have lunch at school, as does mother, since she can use her lunch hour to catch up on some marking.
